comments: Abolished 1.10.1932 and added to the parish of Hereford.

Abolished 24.3.1887 and divided between the parishes of Sutton 
    and Bodenham. See also Table 2, note (k).

Abolished 1.4.1935 and added to the parish of Grosmont Fawr. 
    See also Table 2, notes (a), (c) and (m).

That part which until 1.4.1935 formed the parishes of Grosmont and Llangua.. 
    See also Table 2, note (m)..

Created 1.10.1932 from the parishes of All Saints, St. Owen, Holmer 
    Within, St. Nicholas, St. Peter, St. Martin, Tupsley, St. John the Baptist, 
    Huntingdon and The Vineyard. Abolished 1.4.1974 to become an unparished area.
Created 25.3.1884 out of the parish of Holmer & Shelwick.

Abolished 25.3.1884 and divided into the parishes of Holmer, Holmer 
    Within and Breinton.

Created 25.3.1884 out of the parishes of Holmer & Shelwick and 
    All Saints. Abolished 1.10.1932 and added to the parish of Hereford.
